analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol:
	Contract ChrysalisToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#93)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of ChrysalisToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#188-189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of ChrysalisToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ChrysalisToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#207-208) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of ChrysalisToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/9/0xbb7406274368d3385e89512c167ace3eab4a5763.sol#208) is not in mixedCase
